duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain relationships with world class sports, music, and entertainment brands with the goal of growing and retaining their business and helping them receive the best experience out of CounterFind possible!
Work closely with the Sales, Business Development, and Software teams to escalate issues and help with platform improvements
Help identify opportunities to grow partnerships and handle all upsell and renewals with existing customers

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Sports Media/Management, Communications or a relevant discipline (Master's preferred)
Experience with Google Sheets and Google Slides
Experience in the Licensing, Sports, Music, or Entertainment industries is nice to have, but not a must!
Must live in Dallas, Texas or be willing to relocate. This is not a Remote position.
